mapper.select: SELECT driveway_id, driveway_name, driveway_type, driveway_status, parkinglot_name FROM park_driveway d LEFT JOIN parking_parkinglot p ON d.parkinglot_id = p.parkinglot_id WHERE d.parkinglot_id = #{parkingLotId}

SELECT driveway_id, driveway_name, driveway_type, driveway_status, parkinglot_name FROM park_driveway d LEFT JOIN parking_parkinglot p ON d.parkinglot_id = p.parkinglot_id WHERE (p.parkinglot_id = #{parkingLotId} OR p.parent_parkinglot_id = #{parkingLotId}) AND driveway_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{drivewayName}, '%')
